macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: S&P 500 Opens 2026 with Weak Decline, Failing Santa Claus Rally
items.summary: The S&P 500 experienced a weak decline at the open of 2026 amid thin liquidity and low trading volume, facing a 'valuation trap' with extreme Shiller CAPE ratios. Upcoming catalysts include January jobs data and Fed policy amid tariff inflation risks.

items.title: Wall Street Edges Higher in Wobbly Start to 2026 Trading
items.summary: On the first trading day of 2026, the Dow rose 0.7% to 48,382.39, S&P 500 gained 0.2% to 6,858.47, while Nasdaq dipped less than 0.1% to 23,235.63, driven by mixed tech performances including Nvidia up 1.3% and Tesla down 2.6% on falling sales.

items.title: FOMC Minutes Show Closer-Than-Expected Rate Cut Decision, Hawkish Tilt
items.summary: Recent FOMC meeting minutes revealed the December rate cut decision was narrower than anticipated, providing a slight hawkish signal for 2026 with markets pricing only two cuts. This supported modest USD strength amid precious metals selloff.

items.title: S&P 500 Forms Moderate Reversal After Record Highs, Eyes New Highs
items.summary: The S&P 500 underwent a textbook moderate reversal last week after new record highs, partially due to precious metals bubble burst, but remains up over 15% in 2025 with potential for new highs above 6,940.

items.title: Markets Closed January 4, Focus on Fed Dovish Shift and China Data
items.summary: US, Asian markets closed on January 4 holiday with no new S&P 500 earnings; investors eye Fed's expected dovish 2026 policy, China PMI showing moderate services growth, and Bank of Japan loose policy supporting Nikkei highs.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Surges Past $91,000 Amid U.S. Involvement in Venezuela
items.summary: Bitcoin climbed above $91,000, up 1.4%, with Ethereum reaching $3,150 and XRP over $2, driven by U.S. military action capturing Venezuela's President Maduro and boosting risk appetite. Total crypto market cap hit $3.2T, with $180M in futures liquidations mostly from shorts.[3]

items.title: Crypto Market Slides with BTC and ETH Sharp Sell-Off
items.summary: The broader crypto market experienced a slide as Bitcoin and Ethereum faced sharp sell-offs, amid focus on regulatory shifts; total market cap at $3.11T with neutral Fear and Greed Index at 38.[1]

items.title: Bitcoin Whales Selling: Bearish On-Chain Signals Despite Green Candles
items.summary: On-chain data from Glassnode reveals Bitcoin whales are not accumulating but exchanges consolidating holdings; short-term cost basis declining, signaling potential further downside unless BTC holds above $107K.[2]

items.title: China Launches Incentives for Digital Yuan to Accelerate De-Dollarization
items.summary: China introduced incentives for its e-CNY starting January 1, 2026, targeting BRICS de-dollarization, potentially impacting global settlements and stablecoin demand in cross-border crypto.[1]

items.title: Virtuals Protocol Surges 15% on AI Agent Momentum
items.summary: Virtuals Protocol (VIRTUAL) gained 15% in 24h with $235M volume, fueled by AI agent economy hype and new exchange listings.[1]

items.title: Stacks (STX) Rises 14% on Technical Breakout
items.summary: Stacks (STX) jumped 14% to $0.30 after a technical breakout, reclaiming key levels and attracting bullish momentum.[1]

items.title: Bitcoin Dominance Crashes, Signaling Altcoin Rotation
items.summary: Bitcoin dominance is declining, with early signs of money rotating into altcoins, potentially sparking a mini altseason in January 2026.[5]

items.title: Ethereum and Solana Positioned for 2026 DeFi Reboot
items.summary: Ethereum and Solana are setting the stage for a DeFi reboot in 2026, highlighting major project developments in the ecosystem.[4]

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: AI Sector Undergoes Fundamental Realignment in 2026 as Hype Meets Reality
items.summary: The artificial intelligence industry is shifting focus from expanding large models to optimizing existing ones through post-training techniques and autonomous workflow automation. A critical trade-off has emerged: advanced reasoning capabilities like DeepSeek's R1 model correlate with increased hallucination rates, highlighting reliability concerns that can no longer be ignored.

items.title: Quantum Computing and AI Integration Reaching Practical Maturity
items.summary: Quantum processors are demonstrating capability in computational problems where AI systems face constraints, particularly in financial risk optimization, drug discovery, and materials science. The combination of quantum hardware with AI-managed error correction is approaching practical advantage in 2026.

items.title: World Models and Embodied AI Emerging as Critical Research Focus
items.summary: Major tech companies including Google are prioritizing interactive world models for embodied AI applications like robots and autonomous vehicles. Researchers believe synthetic training environments could accelerate AI agent development by allowing systems to experience thousands of years of scenarios in weeks.

items.title: Generative AI and Quantum Computing Dominating 2026 Technology Trends
items.summary: Industry analysis of 700 recent news articles identifies generative AI and quantum computing as the dominant technology trends reshaping industries from healthcare to entertainment, marking a shift from traditional AI approaches.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
